description: Primes n such that nextprime(n) - n = ( number of divisors of (nextprime(n)+n)/2 )-1.
prog: (PARI) p1=3; for(m=2, 112664172, p2=nextprime(p1+1); if(p2-p1==numdiv((p2+p1)/2)-1, print1(p1 ", ")); p1=p2) /* _Donovan Johnson_, Sep 10 2012 */
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
extensions: Next term if it exists is > 2*10^6. - Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org) Apr 13 2001
Offset corrected and a(5)-a(26) from _Donovan Johnson_, Sep 10 2012
